title: Battle Hymn of the Republic

tokens.lyric: Mine eyes have seen the glory of the coming of the Lord,

lines.raw: [A]Mine eyes have seen the glory of the coming of the Lord,

tokens.lyric: He is trampling out the vintage where the grapes of wrath are stored;

lines.raw: [A7]He is trampling out the vintage where the grapes of wrath are stored;

tokens.lyric: He hath loosed the fateful lightning of His terrible swift sword.

lines.raw: [D]He hath loosed the fateful lightning of His terrible swift sword.

tokens.lyric: His truth is marching on.

lines.raw: [D]His truth is marching on.

tokens.lyric: Glory, glory, Hallelujah! Glory, glory Hallelujah!

lines.raw: [A]Glory, glory, Hallelujah! Glory, glory Hallelujah!

tokens.lyric: Glory, glory Hallelujah! His truth is marching on.

lines.raw: [A7]Glory, glory Hallelujah! His truth is marching on.

tokens.lyric: I have seen Him the watch fires of a hundred circling camps,

lines.raw: [D]I have seen Him the watch fires of a hundred circling camps,

tokens.lyric: They have built Him an altar in the evening dews and damps.

lines.raw: [A]They have built Him an altar in the evening dews and damps.

tokens.lyric: I can read His righteous sentence in the dim and flaring lamps,

lines.raw: [F#m]I can read His righteous sentence in the dim and flaring lamps,

tokens.lyric: His day is marching on.

lines.raw: [E7]His day is marching on.

tokens.lyric: He has sounded forth the trumpet that shall never call retreat,

lines.raw: [A]He has sounded forth the trumpet that shall never call retreat,

tokens.lyric: He is sifting out the hearts of men before His judgment seat;

lines.raw: [A7]He is sifting out the hearts of men before His judgment seat;

tokens.lyric: O, be swift my soul, to answer Him, be jubilant my feet!

lines.raw: [D]O, be swift my soul, to answer Him, be jubilant my feet!

tokens.lyric: Our God is marching on.

lines.raw: [E7]Our God is marching on.

tokens.lyric: In the beauty of the lilies Christ was born across the sea,

lines.raw: [A]In the beauty of the lilies Christ was born across the sea,

tokens.lyric: With a glory in his bosom that transfigures you and me;

lines.raw: [A7]With a glory in his bosom that transfigures you and me;

tokens.lyric: As he lives to make men holy, let us live to make men free!

lines.raw: [D]As he lives to make men holy, let us live to make men free!

tokens.lyric: While God is marching on.

lines.raw: [E7]While God is marching on.

tokens.lyric: He is coming like the glory of the morning on the wave,

lines.raw: [A]He is coming like the glory of the morning on the wave,

tokens.lyric: He is wisdom to the mighty, He is honor to the brave.

lines.raw: [A7]He is wisdom to the mighty, He is honor to the brave.

tokens.lyric: So the world shall be His footstool, and the soul of wrong His slave.

lines.raw: [D]So the world shall be His footstool, and the soul of wrong His slave.

tokens.lyric: Our God is marching on.

lines.raw: [E7]Our God is marching on.
